# spirl_realm (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a realm in SPIRL.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve information about an existing realm
data "spirl_realm" "production" {
  trust_domain_id = spirl_trust_domain.my_domain.id
  name            = "production"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the realm
- `trust_domain_id` (String) The ID of the trust domain the realm belongs to

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) An RFC3339 timestamp for when the realm was created
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the realm
